description: FastAPI router module defining authentication endpoints: register, login, and current user info, with support for SQLite and in-memory user stores, JWT authentication, and user management functions.

methods.name: reset_auth_state
methods.description: Resets in-memory or SQLite user data for test isolation and development.

methods.name: _normalize_email
methods.description: Normalizes email by stripping and converting to lowercase.

methods.name: _get_user_by_email
methods.description: Retrieves user record by email from SQLite or in-memory store.

methods.name: _create_user
methods.description: Creates a new user record with hashed password and stores it.

methods.name: _get_user_by_id
methods.description: Retrieves user record by user ID from SQLite or in-memory store.

methods.name: _user_public
methods.description: Converts user record dict to UserPublic model.

methods.name: get_current_user
methods.description: Dependency to extract current user from JWT token.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user with password hashing.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate user and generate JWT token.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Endpoint to return current authenticated user's info.
